docs.title: 1. Install Aqua
docs.text:
You can download installer from here

Tip

You need to add aqua bin folder to environment variable PATH

docs.title: 2. Install Aqua-Aquarium
docs.text:
1. Download installer.aqua file from here

  2. Run aqua <installer.aqua's path> in terminal

  3. Please allow request of using shell
